verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe הַחֹֽקְקִ֖ים <S%H2710><s%> unto them that decree חִקְקֵי־ <S%H2711><s%> decrees אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> unrighteous וּֽמְכַתְּבִ֥ים <S%H3789><s%> and that write עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> grievousness כִּתֵּֽבוּ׃ <S%H3789><s%> [which] they have prescribed

לְהַטּ֤וֹת <S%H5186><s%> To turn aside מִדִּין֙ <S%H1779><s%> from judgment דַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1800><s%> the needy וְלִגְזֹ֕ל <S%H1497><s%> and to take away מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> the right עֲנִיֵּ֣י <S%H6041><s%> from the poor עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> of my people לִהְי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become אַלְמָנוֹת֙ <S%H490><s%> that widows שְׁלָלָ֔ם <S%H7998><s%> may be their prey וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְתוֹמִ֖ים <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless יָבֹֽזּוּ׃ <S%H962><s%> and [that] they may rob

וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> now what תַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> And what will ye do לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day פְּקֻדָּ֔ה <S%H6486><s%> of visitation וּלְשׁוֹאָ֖ה <S%H7722><s%> and in the desolation מִמֶּרְחָ֣ק <S%H4801><s%> afar תָּב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> [which] shall come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> will you תָּנ֣וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> flee לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <S%H5833><s%> help-ed וְאָ֥נָה <S%H575><s%> where תַעַזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> leave כְּבוֹדְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3519><s%> glorious

בִּלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> Without me they shall כָרַע֙ <S%H3766><s%> bow down תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> among אַסִּ֔יר <S%H616><s%> under the prisoners וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> among הֲרוּגִ֖ים <S%H2026><s%> under the slain יִפֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> and they shall fall בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> is not turned away אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> For all this his anger וְע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> but his hand נְטוּיָֽה׃ <S%H5186><s%> [is] stretched out still ס

ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> O אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> Assyrian שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the rod אַפִּ֑י <S%H639><s%> of mine anger וּמַטֶּה־ <S%H4294><s%> and the staff ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> whose בְיָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> in their hand זַעְמִֽי׃ <S%H2195><s%> is mine indignation

בְּג֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation חָנֵף֙ <S%H2611><s%> him against an hypocritical אֲשַׁלְּחֶ֔נּוּ <S%H7971><s%> I will send וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and against the people עֶבְרָתִ֖י <S%H5678><s%> of my wrath אֲצַוֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H6680><s%> will I give him a charge לִשְׁלֹ֤ל <S%H7997><s%> to take שָׁלָל֙ <S%H7998><s%> the spoil וְלָבֹ֣ז <S%H962><s%> and to take בַּ֔ז <S%H957><s%> the prey [וּלְשִׂימֹו כ] (וּלְשׂוּמֹ֥ו <S%H7760><s%> appoint ק) מִרְמָ֖ס <S%H4823><s%> trample כְּחֹ֥מֶר <S%H2563><s%> like the mire חוּצֽוֹת׃ <S%H2351><s%> of the streets

וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so יְדַמֶּ֔ה <S%H1819><s%> Howbeit he meaneth וּלְבָב֖וֹ <S%H3824><s%> not so neither doth his heart לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so יַחְשֹׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> think כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> rather לְהַשְׁמִ֣יד <S%H8045><s%> to destroy בִּלְבָב֔וֹ <S%H3824><s%> so but [it is] in his heart וּלְהַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> and cut off גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> nations לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor מְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> not a few
כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for יֹאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> For he saith הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not שָׂרַ֛י <S%H8269><s%> [Are] not my princes יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> altogether מְלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> king

הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> like כְּכַרְכְּמִ֖ישׁ <S%H3751><s%> Carchemish כַּלְנ֑וֹ <S%H3641><s%> [Is] not Calno אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> like כְאַרְפַּד֙ <S%H774><s%> Arpad חֲמָ֔ת <S%H2574><s%> Hamath אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not כְדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> Damascus שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> Samaria

כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after מָצְאָ֣ה <S%H4672><s%> hath found יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> As my hand לְמַמְלְכֹ֖ת <S%H4467><s%> the kingdoms הָאֱלִ֑יל <S%H457><s%> of the idols וּפְסִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6456><s%> and whose graven images מִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> did excel them of Jerusalem וּמִשֹּׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> and of Samaria

הֲלֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> not עָשִׂ֛יתִי <S%H6213><s%> Shall I not as I have done לְשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> unto Samaria וְלֶאֱלִילֶ֑יהָ <S%H457><s%> and her idols כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> so do לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וְלַעֲצַבֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6091><s%> images ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will be that כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יְבַצַּ֤ע <S%H1214><s%> hath performed אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> Wherefore it shall come to pass [that] when the Lord אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַֽעֲשֵׂ֔הוּ <S%H4639><s%> his whole work בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וּבִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> and on Jerusalem אֶפְקֹ֗ד <S%H6485><s%> I will punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit גֹ֙דֶל֙ <S%H1433><s%> of the stout לְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> heart מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and the glory ר֥וּם <S%H7312><s%> of his high עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> looks

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> For he saith בְּכֹ֤חַ <S%H3581><s%> By the strength יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> of my hand עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have done וּבְחָכְמָתִ֖י <S%H2451><s%> [it] and by my wisdom כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נְבֻנ֑וֹתִי <S%H995><s%> for I am prudent וְאָסִ֣יר ׀ <S%H5493><s%> and I have removed גְּבוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1367><s%> the bounds עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people [וַעֲתִידֹתֵיהֶם כ] (וַעֲתוּדֹֽותֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6264><s%> treasures ק) שׁוֹשֵׂ֔תִי <S%H8154><s%> and have robbed וְאוֹרִ֥יד <S%H3381><s%> and I have put down כַּאבִּ֖יר <S%H47><s%> man יוֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants

וַתִּמְצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> hath found כַקֵּ֤ן ׀ <S%H7064><s%> as a nest יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> And my hand לְחֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> the riches הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְכֶאֱסֹף֙ <S%H622><s%> and as one gathereth בֵּיצִ֣ים <S%H1000><s%> eggs עֲזֻב֔וֹת <S%H5800><s%> [that are] left כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the earth אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אָסָ֑פְתִּי <S%H622><s%> have I gathered וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become נֹדֵ֣ד <S%H5074><s%> and there was none that moved כָּנָ֔ף <S%H3671><s%> the wing וּפֹצֶ֥ה <S%H6475><s%> or opened פֶ֖ה <S%H6310><s%> the mouth וּמְצַפְצֵֽף׃ <S%H6850><s%> or peeped

הֲיִתְפָּאֵר֙ <S%H6286><s%> boast הַגַּרְזֶ֔ן <S%H1631><s%> Shall the axe עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over הַחֹצֵ֣ב <S%H2672><s%> itself against him that heweth בּ֑וֹ אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יִתְגַּדֵּ֤ל <S%H1431><s%> magnify הַמַּשּׂוֹר֙ <S%H4883><s%> therewith? [or] shall the saw עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מְנִיפ֔וֹ <S%H5130><s%> itself against him that shaketh כְּהָנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> should shake שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <S%H7626><s%> it? as if the rod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְרִימָ֔יו <S%H7311><s%> [itself] against them that lift it up כְּהָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> should lift up מַטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> [or] as if the staff לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not עֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> [itself as if it were] no wood

לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יְשַׁלַּ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> send הָאָד֜וֹן <S%H113><s%> Therefore shall the Lord יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the GOD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּמִשְׁמַנָּ֖יו <S%H4924><s%> among his fat ones רָז֑וֹן <S%H7332><s%> leanness וְתַ֧חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under כְּבֹד֛וֹ <S%H3519><s%> and under his glory יֵקַ֥ד <S%H3344><s%> he shall kindle יְקֹ֖ד <S%H3350><s%> a burning כִּיק֥וֹד <S%H3350><s%> A burning אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> like the burning of a fire

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will become אֽוֹר־ <S%H216><s%> And the light יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> shall be for a fire וּקְדוֹשׁ֖וֹ <S%H6918><s%> and his Holy One לְלֶהָבָ֑ה <S%H3852><s%> for a flame וּבָעֲרָ֗ה <S%H1197><s%> and it shall burn וְאָֽכְלָ֛ה <S%H398><s%> and devour שִׁית֥וֹ <S%H7898><s%> his thorns וּשְׁמִיר֖וֹ <S%H8068><s%> and his briers בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> in one

וּכְב֤וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory יַעְרוֹ֙ <S%H3293><s%> of his forest וְכַרְמִלּ֔וֹ <S%H3759><s%> and of his fruitful field מִנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> both soul וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> and body יְכַלֶּ֑ה <S%H3615><s%> And shall consume וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּמְסֹ֥ס <S%H4549><s%> fainteth נֹסֵֽס׃ <S%H5264><s%> lift up as an ensign

וּשְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7605><s%> And the rest עֵ֛ץ <S%H6086><s%> of the trees יַעְר֖וֹ <S%H3293><s%> of his forest מִסְפָּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> shall be few יִֽהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> become וְנַ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> that a child יִכְתְּבֵֽם׃ <S%H3789><s%> may write פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will never יוֹסִ֨יף <S%H3254><s%> shall no more again ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again שְׁאָ֤ר <S%H7605><s%> [that] the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּפְלֵיטַ֣ת <S%H6413><s%> and such as are escaped בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob לְהִשָּׁעֵ֖ן <S%H8172><s%> stay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מַכֵּ֑הוּ <S%H5221><s%> upon him that smote וְנִשְׁעַ֗ן <S%H8172><s%> them but shall stay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בֶּאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> in truth

שְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7605><s%> The remnant יָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall return שְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> [even] the remnant יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> God גִּבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1368><s%> unto the mighty

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> though יִהְיֶ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become עַמְּךָ֤ <S%H5971><s%> For though thy people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel כְּח֣וֹל <S%H2344><s%> be as the sand הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea שְׁאָ֖ר <S%H7605><s%> [yet] a remnant יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> of them shall return בּ֑וֹ כִּלָּי֥וֹן <S%H3631><s%> the consumption חָר֖וּץ <S%H2782><s%> decreed שׁוֹטֵ֥ף <S%H7857><s%> shall overflow צְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> with righteousness

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For כָלָ֖ה <S%H3617><s%> a consumption וְנֶחֱרָצָ֑ה <S%H2782><s%> even determined אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> For the Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> shall make בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of all the land ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3068><s%> GOD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> be not afraid עַמִּ֛י <S%H5971><s%> O my people יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwellest צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion מֵֽאַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of the Assyrian בַּשֵּׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> thee with a rod יַכֶּ֔כָּה <S%H5221><s%> he shall smite וּמַטֵּ֥הוּ <S%H4294><s%> his staff יִשָּֽׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> and shall lift up עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> against thee after the manner מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt
